# UV Setup Guide for disseqt-sdk-python

## ✅ Project Setup Complete

This project is now configured to use `uv` for fast Python package management.

## Quick Reference

### Initial Setup (Already Done!)
```bash
uv sync --dev
```

### Common Commands

#### Install/Update Dependencies
```bash
# Sync all dependencies (including dev)
uv sync --dev

# Sync only production dependencies
uv sync

# Add a new dependency
uv add <package-name>

# Add a dev dependency
uv add --dev <package-name>

# Update all dependencies
uv sync --upgrade
```

#### Running Commands
```bash
# Run tests
uv run pytest tests/ -v

# Run tests with coverage
uv run pytest -q --cov=disseqt_sdk --cov-report=term-missing

# Run test with coverage for agnetic-sdk package
 uv run pytest tests/agentic/ -v --cov=src/disseqt_agentic_sdk --cov-report=term-missing

# Run linting
uv run ruff check .

# Fix linting issues automatically
uv run ruff check . --fix

# Run type checking
uv run mypy src/disseqt_sdk

# Format code
uv run black .

# Run pre-commit hooks
uv run pre-commit run --all-files
```

#### Development Workflow
```bash
# Install pre-commit hooks (one-time setup)
uv run pre-commit install

# Run all quality checks
uv run ruff check .
uv run mypy src/disseqt_sdk
uv run pytest tests/ -q
```

#### Building and Publishing
```bash
# Build the package
uv build

# Publish to PyPI (when ready)
uv publish
```

## Project Structure

- **pyproject.toml**: Project configuration and dependencies
- **uv.lock**: Locked dependency versions (committed to git)
- **.venv/**: Virtual environment (not committed to git)
- **.python-version**: Python version specification (3.10.14)

### Production

## Why UV?

- **Fast**: 10-100x faster than pip
- **Reliable**: Deterministic dependency resolution
- **Modern**: Follows latest Python packaging standards (PEP 735)
- **Simple**: Single tool for all Python project needs

## Next Steps

1. Install pre-commit hooks: `uv run pre-commit install`
2. Make changes to code
3. Run tests: `uv run pytest tests/ -v`
4. Check linting: `uv run ruff check .`
5. Commit changes (pre-commit hooks will run automatically)
